channel.title: gnome on Dan Aukes
channel.description: Recent content in gnome on Dan Aukes

item.title: Post-Install Miscellaneous Steps
item.description: Tweaking the GUI Open “Extensions” and turn off desktop icons Update firefox settings flatpak firefox settings found in ~/.

item.title: Multiple Clocks in Ubuntu / Gnome
item.description: sudo apt install gnome-clocks flatpak install com.mattjakeman.ExtensionManager flatpak run com.mattjakeman.ExtensionManager click browse tab search for “world clock” and select “panel world clock”
